title: Genexa Cold Crush For Children
description: Shop Cold Crush For Children and read reviews at Walgreens. Pickup & Same Day Delivery available on most store items.
cleaned_text: Cold Crush For Children60.0Ea How would you like to receive this item ? Wellness in a snap1 Description - Multi-symptom cough & cold medicine: Organic blend of homeopathic ingredients is formulated to address children's cold symptoms so your little ones can get back to playing. - Safe and non-drowsy: Our organic cold medicine for kids is non-drowsy with no known drug interactions. - Physician formulated: Cold Crush's safe, organic formula was created by our Chief Formulating Officer, a medical doctor and homeopathic physician. - Ingredients kids deserve: No artificial sweeteners or artificial preservatives, artificial dyes, parabens, common allergens, or artificial flavors. Certified vegan, gluten free, organic, lactose free, & non-GMO. - Easy to use: Made with organic acai berry flavor, our tasty tablets are convenient for at-home or on-the-go use. Made in United States Children 4-11 years of age: chew 2 tablets at the onset of symptoms. Do not swallow whole. Repeat every 4-6 hours as needed. Children under 4 years of age: ask a doctor before use.© throat Carnauba Wax, Organic Dextrose, Organic Maltodextrin, Organic Rice Bran Extract Warnings Shipping Specifications Not eligible for Ship to Store at this time This product cannot be shipped to the following state(s): - AA - AE - AK - AP - AS - GU - HI - MP - PR - VI Shipping Weight (in lbs): 0.13 Product in inches (LxWxH): 1.87x 2.87x 4.3 [See Ship to store FAQs](/topic/help/shophelp/shipping_help_main.jsp) Reviews for Genexa Cold Crush For ChildrenLoading reviews [Show more](javascript:void(0)) Reviews for Genexa Cold Crush For ChildrenLoading reviews [Show more](javascript:void(0)) Similar Products 1 Walgreens provides this information for educational purposes only.
